# isArrayArray

> Test if a value is an array of arrays.


<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var isArrayArray = require( '@stdlib/assert/is-array-array' );
```

#### isArrayArray( value )

Tests if a `value` is an `array` of `arrays`.

``` javascript
var bool = isArrayArray( [ [], [] ] );
// returns true

bool = isArrayArray( [ {}, {} ] );
// returns false

bool = isArrayArray( [] );
// returns false

bool = isArrayArray( {} );
// returns false

bool = isArrayArray( [ null, {} ] );
// returns false
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

<section class="examples">

## Examples

``` javascript
var isArrayArray = require( '@stdlib/assert/is-array-array' );

var bool = isArrayArray( [ [], [], [] ] );
// returns true

bool = isArrayArray( [ [], {} ] );
// returns false

bool = isArrayArray( [] );
// returns false

bool = isArrayArray( {} );
// returns false

bool = isArrayArray( [ 'a', 'b' ] );
// returns false

bool = isArrayArray( null );
// returns false
```

</section>

<!-- /.examples -->
